issue.title: [Java] Support vector deduplicate function
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-6113](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-6113). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Remove adjacent deduplicated elements from a vector. This function can be used, for example, in finding distinct values, or in compressing the vector data.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-6113?focusedCommentId=16917457) by Micah Kornfield (emkornfield@gmail.com):*
Issue resolved by pull request 4993
